name: Motivation for artificial intelligence technology adoption and utilization for companies using the technology, by industry: 2016–18
description: Motivation for artificial intelligence technology adoption and utilization for companies using the technology, by industry: 2016–18

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_to_automate_tasks_performed_by_labor
variableMeasured.description: To Automate Tasks Performed By Labor

variableMeasured.name: field_to_upgrade_outdated_processes_or_methods
variableMeasured.description: To Upgrade Outdated Processes Or Methods

variableMeasured.name: field_to_improve_quality_or_reliability_of_processes_or_methods
variableMeasured.description: To Improve Quality Or Reliability Of Processes Or Methods

variableMeasured.name: field_to_expand_the_range_of_goods_or_services

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Detail may exceed total because companies could select more than one response. Industry classification is based on dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that reported a low, moderate, or high use of the technology (see Table 84).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2019 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2018.
